translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

In the capacity of Colonel Chief of the Legion of National Guards of this District and competently authorized by the Most Excellent Sir Your Lordship Captain Francisco Xavier, commander of the forces besieging the town of São José do Norte, in order not only to prevent the enemies from seizing them, but also to supply our divisions with such articles, should they be necessary. 2nd — To all persons who take said ponchos Your Lordship Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro to forward this to the Most Excellent Sir Bento Gonçalves da Silva. Henceforth may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Pantano Grande Estate, August 9, 1836. Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim José de Freitas Justice of the Peace of the Parish of Mostardas. Domingos José de Almeida Colonel Chief of the Legion of the District of Rio Grande.
